QuestData.Title: The Cipher of Damnation - The First Fragment Recovered
QuestData.Description: <Grom'tor wraps the documents up and places them in a lockbox.>$B$BTake this box to father. He awaits your return at the farm, northeast of here.$B$BTell him that I will be home soon. As soon as I am done having my fun...
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Grom'tor's Lockbox to Oronok Torn-heart at Oronok's Farm in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: When the Cipher of Damnation is reformed, we shall end this curse!
